title: GAME CRASH AFTER I CLICK "LAUNCH" IN THE LOL_PATCHERUX
body:
Every time I click the launch button....The game just disappear. I just tried deleting and and redownload the game. I was sure it was gonna work but nope. Even after reinstall it, the game still don't launch.

I'm on a MacBook by the way.

I need help guys!

replies.body:
This issue and most issues on the Mac client, stem from a poor connection to our servers. Most of the time, this can be resolved by the steps in our Mac [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as they cover some potentially problematic network configurations, so I recommend giving those a try.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
